metadata.title: CVE-2019-1010174 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: CImg The CImg Library v.2.3.3 and earlier is affected by: commandinjection. The impact is: RCE. The component is: load_network() function.The attack vector is: Loading an image from a user-controllable url canlead to command injection, because no string sanitization is done on theurl. The fixed version is: v.2.3.4.

criterions.comment: gmic package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
